verses.name: Ezekiel 10:6
verses.text: And it came to pass, that when he had commanded the man clothed with linen, saying, Take fire from between the wheels, from between the cherubims; then he went in, and stood beside the wheels.

verses.name: Ezekiel 10:7
verses.text: And one cherub stretched forth his hand from between the cherubims unto the fire that was between the cherubims, and took thereof, and put it into the hands of him that was clothed with linen: who took it, and went out.

verses.name: Ezekiel 10:8
verses.text: And there appeared in the cherubims the form of a man’s hand under their wings.
